name: forzamotorsports.net forum cleanup -smaller
description: Clean up and make significantly tighter the Forza Motorsports user forums. Also Displays search results properly.
additional_info:
03-Aug-2012 v1.1
Found and trimmed a significant amount of wasted space in height elements.
-Improved: left panel poster info.
-New: Trim extra space from quoted text.
-Improved: Reduced height of p elements.
-Fixed: img width distortion
  
02-Aug-2012 v1.0
-Makes search result text visible(!).
-Reduce all images to 50px high with full size hover.
-Reduce the height of the the poster info so that a 1 line post does not take up half a screen.
-Trim between post margins and padding.
